changelog.change: (GitHub issue #4) The component now features adjustable settings, so games other than Sonic 3 are supported! See the README online for more information: https://github.com/Sophira/LiveSplit.RealTimeMinusBonuses/blob/master/README.md
(GitHub issue #5) It is now possible to enter the points bonus directly if you so choose; you can adjust this in the settings.
The entry box will now indicate if an invalid value is entered when RETURN is hit.
(GitHub issue #6) Undoing a split made with the regular split key now works correctly.
Major timing update - the plugin now leaves Real Time alone and pauses Game Time instead. If you used v0.1 and got gold splits, these will need to be reverted or moved to Game Time.
(GitHub issue #2) Timing is now much more accurate.
(GitHub issue #1) Undoing a split will now correctly restore the time that was lost when pausing.
Extremely rough proof-of-concept release. Only suitable for Sonic 3, Sonic & Knuckles, and Sonic 3 & Knuckles.
